name: poetry-slam-calculator
description: Professioneller Punktesummen-Rechner für Poetry Slam Wettbewerbe mit PWA-Funktionalität

scripts.build:gold: vite build && node scripts/version-manager.js && node scripts/cache-bust.js
scripts.preview:gold: vite preview && node scripts/version-manager.js && node scripts/cache-bust.js --preview
scripts.preview:fresh: npm run clean && npm run build:gold && vite preview
scripts.build:pages:gold: NODE_ENV=production vite build && node scripts/version-manager.js && node scripts/cache-bust.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build:pages:gold && echo 'Gold Standard PWA build completed. Push to main branch to deploy.'
